name: Flora (itch) (Jaime Williams)
description:
Flora is a game about running a flower shop and get to know your neighbors along the way, Grow and sell flowers and build relationships with the local village people.

*This is a prototype*

Made by Hibiscus Games;

  • Designer and Producer – Jaime Williams 
  • Programmer – Lewis Mackay 
  • Programmer – Connor Turner 
  • UI and Audio Designer – Malachi Rooney
  • UX and Narpptive Designer – James Mawhinney  
  • 2D Character and Concept Artist – Cristi Dumitru 
  • Environment Artist - Meghan Price 
  • Environment Artist – Setareki Ligaiviu
